name: Two Beasts or Not to Beast!!
name_original: Two Beasts or Not to Beast!!
description:
Description :

Gameplay
An AVG with all mouse controls.
The game is split up into "preparation", "exploration", and "overcoming desire".

Protagonist Haruki is getting ready for a big study session with his crush Kasumi tomorrow.
He'll need to clean up around the house, go shopping, and make other preparations, but he's only got 1 day... And what's worse, his slutty sister-in-law, his sexy stepmom, and tons of other horny kemo girls are here to seduce him!
They will test his will via mini-games (skippable via settings), and if he's defeated, the pleasures of the flesh will end his prep day.

Can Haruki make it to the end of the day without giving in?
